title: Bar Hop Boss
description: [Name] leads the group to more than three bars in one night.

title: Dart Daredevil
description: [Name] hits Bullseye during a game of darts after a few drinks.

title: Pool Shark Pretender
description: [Name] talks a big game at pool but loses spectacularly.

title: Shot Roulette Ringleader
description: [Name] initiates a round of shot roulette with mystery shots.

title: Karaoke Kingpin
description: [Name] belts out a song on stage with surprising stage presence.

title: Flirtation Fumble
description: [Name] tries to flirt and fails with a cheesy pickup line.

title: Beer Pong Buffoon
description: [Name] talks trash at beer pong but misses every shot.

title: Last Man Standing
description: [Name] is the last one still drinking at the end of the night.

title: Jukebox Jockey
description: [Name] takes control of the music, playing a controversial song choice.

title: Arm Wrestling Wager
description: [Name] challenges a stranger to an arm-wrestling match.

title: Liquid Luck
description: [Name] wins a bet they made only because they were encouraged by drinks.

title: Midnight Munchies
description: [Name] leads the charge to the nearest late-night food joint.

title: Unexpected Philosopher
description: [Name] gets unexpectedly deep and philosophical out of nowhere.

title: The Prankster
description: [Name] plays a practical joke on one of the boys.

title: Lost & Found
description: [Name] loses an item during the night but miraculously finds it later.

title: The Wanderer
description: [Name] briefly goes missing only to be found chatting up new friends.

title: The Confessor
description: [Name] makes a surprising personal revelation.

title: Dance-Off Challenger
description: [Name] starts an impromptu dance-off with another group.

title: The Protector
description: [Name] takes care of a friend who's had a bit too much.

title: The Escape Artist
description: [Name] mysteriously vanishes at some point, only to reappear with an unbelievable story.
